TopicTitle: Ship for practicing orbits, transfer orbits, and powered landings.

Articles.Content:
This is for newcomers to practice valuable skills they will need to succeed and be glorious!

Protip: This ship wobbles a little lot in the 3rd stage, so you can also practice anti-wobbling techniques

Edit: Crap, almost forgot to say what packs you need. You need Probobobodobodyne, Bacetm, and Siliskotm edition

You might achieve more downloads if you add a pretty picture or two?

PD
